description.value:
The vigilanteâ€™s social identity seems so innocent that it is hard to believe he was involved in wrongdoing. Within his area of renown, this provides a nonmagical effect identical to the @Compendium[pf1.spells.4w51afqi5d9t8nl4]{Innocence} spell.

A vigilante must be at least 5th level and have the renown social talent to take this talent.
